alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued May 26 at 5:14AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK. THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR ZYLAH FAULKS, BLACK, FEMALE, 2 YEARS OLD, 2 FEET 9 INCHES TALL, 30 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING. THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT IS ALSO SEARCHING FOR KAMIL BROWN-SYKES, BLACK, FEMALE, 9 YEARS OLD, 3 FEET 9 INCHES TALL, 80 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR JULIO NAJAR-TREVINO, 29 YEARS OLD, HISPANIC, MALE, 6 FEET 0 INCHES TALL, 190 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, HAZEL EYES AND UNKNOWN CLOTHING IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A GRAY, 2008, SATURN, AURA BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER S W S 6 0 1 8. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN SAN ANTONIO, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 0 2 0 7 7 6 6 0.
